name: CTA Bar
author: William Patton

sections.description: Add CTA bars to your posts/pages inviting readers to perform the action that you want them to.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. The CTA Bar block will becoming available in your editor.
sections.faq:
Does this work in the Classic Editor?

No – this only works with the new WordPress block editor.

Does this work for WordPress < 5.0?

This is a custom block for the new editor added in WordPress 5.0. You need at least that version of WP.

1.0.0

Initial release.

short_description: A block capable of adding CTA bars within posts and have them stick to the top or bottom of the page as users scroll past them.
description: Add CTA bars to your posts/pages inviting readers to perform the action that you want them to.
